text.tspan: Deaths from terrorist attacks, by method of attack, World
Confirmed deaths, including all victims and attackers who died because of a terrorist attack, by the primary
Note: The GTD omits 1993 terrorism data because of a data loss incident and the complexities of retrieving information on events from
